originalText.text: I can't recommend this healthcare office enough! The chiropractor, physical therapist, podiatrist, and nurse practitioner all provide outstanding care and are very efficient. They work together as a team to give a personalized touch to each patient. The new office is beautiful and clean, adding to the overall experience. Most importantly, the staff are incredibly kind and truly care about their patients' well-being. I feel grateful to have found such a great team of healthcare professionals.

originalText.text: Seriously grateful for Mike. Was in excruciating pain, insurance was giving me problems, and overall in a bind. Mike went above and beyond to help me out. Extremely knowledgeable guy with a comforting personality. 11/10 would highly recommend! Thanks Mike!

text.text: Seriously grateful for Mike. Was in excruciating pain, insurance was giving me problems, and overall in a bind. Mike went above and beyond to help me out. Extremely knowledgeable guy with a comforting personality. 11/10 would highly recommend! Thanks Mike!

originalText.text: I have been a patient at Downtown Chiropractic for years. The care and service I have consistently received over the years is second to none. The chiropractic treatment provided by Dr. Wolfson has helped me immensely and Dr. Mark is a great acupuncturist who has identified and treated many of my aches and pains. I highly recommend this practice.

text.text: I have been a patient at Downtown Chiropractic for years. The care and service I have consistently received over the years is second to none. The chiropractic treatment provided by Dr. Wolfson has helped me immensely and Dr. Mark is a great acupuncturist who has identified and treated many of my aches and pains. I highly recommend this practice.

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Downtown Chiropractic for over ten years with different aches and pains and swear by them! They have a large group of doctors, practitioners, and staff here in one location as well as their Midtown office. I have gone to Chiro, Acu, PT, Massage Therapy, Podiatry, Orthopedic, and Primary Care, which is convenient. All are very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend them!

text.text: I’ve been going to Downtown Chiropractic for over ten years with different aches and pains and swear by them! They have a large group of doctors, practitioners, and staff here in one location as well as their Midtown office. I have gone to Chiro, Acu, PT, Massage Therapy, Podiatry, Orthopedic, and Primary Care, which is convenient. All are very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend them!

originalText.text:
Extremely unpleasant place.

Reception stuff never maintains the schedule of clients which leads to long expectation lines usually up to an hour. I do not really understand why they even make appointments as who ever comes first is being served.
I was waiting for my appointment and they let the person who came after me to go ahead of me completely ignoring my appointment. On my request why that person was let go first the stuff gave me an array of bogus explanations. They either have to maintain the amount of people or inform the patients about potential delay and suggest to reschedule an appointment. I never give bad reviews but this happened to me way to many times.  Very negative experience.
